title: 麻辣变形计HOT GIRL EP01 最新热血偶像剧（迪丽热巴、马可、王洋）

json.text: Hot Girl
Episode 1
Our Youth Alliance Club has been established for close to a year.
Today we have to select a leader.
- Am I right? - Right!
Liang Dawei, are you really thinking of competing with Guan Xiaodi for this position?
How is Guan Xiaodi more capable than me?
The Unbeatable Goddess. She is more capable than you in every way.
We will know who is the victor after we have competed.
Unbeatable Goddess? That is because she has not competed against me yet.
- How many times have you challenged me? - My fifth time.
Since you like boxing so much, why not join our Youth Alliance Club?
Not interested.
Then why do you challenge me?
To defeat you.
I can only give you 10 minutes. I have another round to go to.
Cut the nonsense.
Is Guan Xiaodi coming or not? Look at the time.
- Is she scared? - She's definitely not scared of you.
Just wait and see.
- Why isn't Xiaodi here yet? - I don't know.
There's no response in chatgroup. She didn't reply to my text messages either.
At this urgent moment, why bother to text her. Just call her!
Give it to me!
I'll give you another 5 minutes.
Can't say for sure who will win in the end.
What now? What did Guan Xiaodi say?
Has she answered the call?
- No. - What now?
She doesn't dare to come? -Can't wait to lose?
5 more minutes.
After 5 minutes, our match appointment will be over.
If she is not here by then, it means that she forfeits the match.
I will be the leader of the club.
No way that our Xiaodi will give up! Not on your life!
You can take her place. I'm alright with that.
Jet ski...
I don't know how...
No choice then.
You know how to ride one, don't you?
I'm only good at horsing around. When it comes to a real competition, I'm not sure...
5 minutes, counting down now.
- Xiaodi, where are you? - Liang Dawei is only giving you 5 minutes to turn up.
[If you are not here, the position of the club's leader will belong to him!]
Wait.
I still have other matters to attend to today.
No way. The winner has not yet to be decided.
I think you will not let me go today until I defeat you.
Just bring it on!
Ok ok!
Emma, go up there.
I'll take a picture for you. Come over to this side.
Is Guan Xiaodi coming over or not?
Is it time yet?
Almost.
'Almost' means it's not time yet.
You will lose anyway. No harm waiting a while more.
You girls do selfies and take pictures the whole day.
- It's so boring. - What do you about a girl's world.
I'll post them in the Friends Circle. Do go in to 'like' them.
I'm sorry, time's up.
Wait a while more. She'll be right here.
No more waiting after the set time.
Call from Xiaodi.
Hello, Xiaodi, where are you?
I'm still at AK. All done. I'll be right there.
Hurry up. I can't hold out for long here.
About 15 minutes. No, make it 10 minutes.
Tell Liang Dawei to wait.
- How long? - She'll be right here in no time.
Wait a while more. Xiaodi will be here in no time.
Ok, I'll make an exception this time.
I'll give her another 3 minutes.
If she is not here in 3 minutes' time...
the leader of the club will be me.
Not on your life.
Give me the key.
For what?
Had it not been for you, I wouldn't have been delayed for such a long time. Quick!
The winner is not decided yet. When is our next match?
We'll discuss it again after I defeat Liang Dawei.
Key.
Hey, where are you now?
Just passed by Zhonghai Road.
Liang Dawei said if you are not here, he will be the leader of the club.
Do you want me to stand in for you for a while?
You are not his match. Try to delay for another 5 minutes.
♫  If you have a dream, do not linger any longer ♫
♫  Meeting with challenges head on is your attitude♫
♫  say goodbye to yesterday's emptiness. Colour you day today♫
♫  Welcome a new and beautiful future♫
Bubbles!
♫  Don't be sad, stand right up. Do not be afraid of failures in your youth.♫
What are you looking at?
♫  Fighting Day Fighting Day Today is an opportunity♫
♫  Once you have decided, never give up
I want one ice-cream.
♫  Fighting Day ♫
♫  Let's move forward♫
Hold it.
Thank you. -No worries.
♫  Shout it out. If you have a dream, do not linger any longer
♫  Meeting with challenges head on is your attitude ♫
♫  say goodbye to yesterday's emptiness. Colour you day today.♫
♫  Welcome a new and beautiful future♫
♫  Don't waste away the beautiful youth♫
♫  Don't be sad, stand right up. Do not be afraid of failures in your youth.♫
♫  Let's go enjoy the bright shining sun♫
♫  Fighting Day Fighting Day Tomorrow is an opportunity♫
♫  Once you have decided, never give up  ♫ -Fantastic!
Yeah, way to go!
♫  Meeting with challenges head on is your attitude ♫
♫  say goodbye to yesterday's emptiness. Colour you day today.♫
♫  Welcome a new and beautiful future♫
♫  Do not waste away your youth.♫
Liang Dawei, if you leave right now, it goes to show that you are afraid.
If Xiaodi said she's coming, she'll be here.
- Right. - Then, where is she?
I'm telling you, from this moment on,
the leader of Youth Alliance Club is me.
With me, Guan Xiaodi around, you can dream on!
I have placed a can of beer up at the front.
The first one to bring back the can is the winner.
You still have time to concede defeat now.
So childish.
Come on!
Get ready!
Wait. Why is my neck so painful?
Wait.
Ok, let's go.
- Ready!  - Wait wait, is this fastened properly?
Safety first. Alright, let's begin.
Ready?
- Wait.  - Aren't you done yet?
I just wanted to ask if you're ready.
Of course! I'm more than ready.
Then let's begin. What are we waiting for?
Hurry up.
Ready, get set...
Go!
Look!
How is it? Are you cooled off?
Guan Xiaodi! You cheated!
There's no shortcut to victory. You are doomed to lose if you always find excuses for your failure.
Stay put. I'll leave now.
You!
Guan Xiaodi, Female, Age 19. Specializes in sports. Good in boxing, combat boxing, street dancing, Parkour, paragliding, and rock climbing
Personal data  Citizen of Nanqing City Address: Nanqing City Dongchen area No. 27  Graduated from Nanqing City Secondary Vocational School
- Xiaodi! Look at her! - Xiaodi! Xiaodi!
Lost again!
Xiaodi,
I knew you would win.
Of course! I have never lost before. I'm living up to my Unbeatable Goddess title.
Unbeatable Goddess!
Guan Xiaodi! This match doesn't count.
- Based on what? - She cheated.
- Are you the one who arranged this match? - Yes.
- Are you the one who fixed the time and place? - Yes.
- Are you the one who made the rules?  - Yes
Right!
You arranged everything. Yet, you blame me when you lose! Are you still a man?
Don't talk nonsense.
If you don't concede defeat, feel free to look for me anytime.
- Drink this to cool off. Bye-bye.  - Bye Bye
- Bye-bye!- Bye-bye!
You, Guan Xiaodi! Just wait and see!
What's there left to watch? Go!
What's this?
So romantic.
Smells really nice.
You guys look really happy to see me.
Lao Guai. Xiao Xiaodi.
Open your mouth.
- Hello. - I'm not free. I'm not free.
I haven't even told you what I want yet.
I'm not free anyway.
Didn't I tell you before? I'm in seclusion now, I'm not taking any more customer requests.
Pink Pather, tell me. How long have you stayed at home?
401 days.
401 days?
Are you going to break the Guinness Record for Otaku Girl?(Otaku - Person obsesses with computers or computer gaming)
Can you come out for a breather?
I don't need one.
I'm telling you, you are alienating yourself from the real world.
What alienation? What's good about the real world?
So long as I have the Internet, I can do everything.
I don't need the real world.
You... you are suffering from Internet Addiction Syndrome.
It's an illness. You have to get healed. I have medicine. Do you want it?
You are the sick one! I'm good, don't worry.
I don't know what you are up to the whole day at home.
I'm leading the country's Internet addicts to beat those unscupulous retailers.
I'm alone have to take charge of 88 unions.
The time I'm using to chat with you,
I have already given out 450 million coins.
I don't believe I can't fix this.
Piece of cake
I have no idea what you are talking about.
You go about robbing the rich to help the poor everyday
Do you really think you're a hacker empire?
I still have to give my best. Why?
Are you feeling bored today?
You can say that.
I have told you earlier
that many a times, you have to face situations yourself.
Pretty lady, fighting!
You too! Fighting!
See you later.
Is your friend ok?
She's alright. This is her normal self.
That means no do, no die
Such looks, such a figure.
You like her?
Am I such a shallow person?
What does she do?
Her name is Mary, a model.
A Nan Qing City Top Model?
- Introduce her to me.  - Why?
You think too much.
I want to recruit her to our Youth Alliance Club.
No way.
Why?
Guan Xiaodi can recruit pretty girls, why can't I?
Then why are you sticking with me?
Because we have a common enemy.
That is still Guan Xiaodi.
I heard you competed with her on jet skis. You lost, right?
That's because she cheated, and knocked me into the sea.
You even lost to her on a jet ski, what else can you do?
I won't lose the next time.
I plan to compete with her tomorrow.
What if you lose again? That's game over for you, Liang Dawei.
No way!
You... get lost!
Me get lost?!
Come on.
Liang Dawei
Ju Liang,
why are you always hanging out with them? They're Guan Xiaodi's friends.
Who else would I hang out with?
Why are you always following Guan Xiaodi?
Liang Dawei, you just lost to Guan Xiaodi today.
Now, when she's not around,
you're trying to snatch people away from her.
- Do you think that's right? - Ju Liang,
join us.
- Not interested. - You!
Do you think you can snatch Ju Liang away from Guan Xiaodi?
Sooner or later, I will defeat her.
That employee selection you mentioned earlier,
is it still on?
- Of course, it's still on. - When is it?
I'm not too sure.
Are you really interested?
Of course I am.
I'm looking for a job currently. Need the salary.
But this is the nation's top bodyguard organization.
It's not easy to get into.
If it's as good as you say, I must give it my best.
I heard they are organizing a training camp to select their employees.
You will be selected only after you graduate from the training camp.
What is Lie Huo Shen Dun?
What training camp? Is it fun?
It's not just fun,
it's also very exciting.
Miss Lady, just stay committed to your modeling job.
But I also want to take part.
Great!
We'll leave now.
Keep me posted of any updates.
- Let's go.  - I want to take part too.- Okay!
Hey loser, miss me?
I want to defeat you.
I think it's a huge challenge for you.
Do you dare to compete with me again?
The result will still be the same even if we compete another 10 rounds.
If you win again, I will acknowledge that you are the Unbeatable Goddess.
Whatever you say, I will do.
Remember what you said.
What if you lose?
Impossible..
If you lose,
I'll be the leader of Youth Alliance Club.
Okay, deal.
When shall we compete?
- As usual, you decide on the time, place and the sport. -Don't you regret.
Rest assured,
you will lose for sure.
When have I ever lost?
I need to go. I have a video call from my dad.
Once the place and sport are decided, text me.
Dad.
Daughter, have you received the flowers?
I got them.
Look at the flowers you bought. What kind of flowers are they?
Do you think they suit me?
Remember the day after tomorrow is your mom's death anniversary.
Bring the flowers to her.
- Daughter, what are you thinking?  - Nothing. I know.
Rest early. It's so late.
Be back home early.
Miss you. Bye
Alright.
Timing and subtitles brought to you by The Gone With The Shirt Team @ Viki
Mommy! Mommy!
Mommy!
I thought you wouldn't dare to come.
Not dare to come? I'm afraid you will lose badly.
It's been a year and a half since anyone challenged me. You really have guts.
It's an honor to be the first one.
And you will only be the next loser.
Slow down!
Wait for me!
Thank you.
Why did you run?
Yang Yang, don't run away so fast in the future.
What if the elevator doors closed?
Then we can take the next one.
Wrong. Mommy is saying what if you get crushed by the doors?
That is very dangerous.
It won't happen. The young man helped me just now.
Thank you.
See, the young man protected you just now.
What should we say to him?
Thank you, GeGe.(GeGe - respected Older Brother)
Yang Yang, you have to listen to your mommy.
Take care to protect yourself, you know?
- Yes, I know. - Thank you.
- Say goodbye to GeGe. - Bye, GeGe.
Kuo Hai, long time no see.
It means a lot to me that you can be here.
You are doing such a big thing in Nan Qing City. How can I not help?
Without support from the higher ups, I wouldn't think of doing this.
Nan Qing City is our nation's front door.
The economy, technology, commerce industries are so busy.
It really needs an organization like Shen Du.
I hope that Lie Huo Shen Du (LHSD) can develop well here in Nan Qing City.
We will need new blood.
As the protection services agency
for security safety recording systems,
When it comes to recruiting newcomers,
you have to be extra careful.
Yes, I know. I'm here in Nan Qing not just solely for the purpose of the selection.
Do you still remember the seed project which I mentioned before?
Are you saying that you want to use Lie Huo Shen Du as a point, to organize a training camp
to develop talent for the country through professional training.
You wish to carry out this plan?
Put it this way,
I hope to recruit a group of capable young people who have aspirations and talent.
Those who were born from 1990 to 1995.
Gather them in the camp
and nurture them for the country.
Good. When do you wish to carry this out?
I have already started.
Already started? That means you have the training venue ready?
This is different from the past.
This training camp has no fences or walls.
We can conduct the training and selection whenever and wherever.
A training camp without fences?
This is a great concept.
The society is a big training ground.
It's up to us to choose.
However, we must set high standards.
Put quality before quantity. So long as we can train one person, that in itself is also a great gain.
If we succeed in doing this,
it is a great benefit for Nan Qing City.
Be rest assured.
I'll keep a tight rein on it.
But I still need your support in many areas.
That goes without saying.
All or nothing. Deal?
Stand back and watch.
Are you happy today?
Yang Yang, see this store. Let's look in this store.
Take a seat here.
Do you like it?
It has been 8 rounds. The dealer is always the winner.
Boring.
The first to make a mistake will lose then.
It was supposed to be a match of technique, now it's become a match of stamina.
Are you conceding defeat?
Concede defeat?
Are you trying to cheat me?
Any point in doing that?
You are right. It's meaningless.
Want to leave?
What's the point of you, a man, trying to compete with a woman every time?
How about we go against each other in rock climbing?
Congratulations, you have yet again chosen another of my strong sports.
Yeah, you can boast all you want about it.
Do you know about the Dao Feng Rock Climbing Club?
The top Rock Climbing Club in Nan Qing City. Of course I know.
They have a climbing system built according to YDS standards.(Yosemite Decimal System - rates the difficulty of climbs)
This I know, the simplest one is Class 5.1, medium difficulty is Class 5.6.
The most difficult is Class 5.9.
The record for Class 5.9 is set by me, 3 minutes and 45 seconds.
GeGe, where are you taking me to go play?
- Why don't we go to the playgound, ok? - Ok.
Go.
Get in the car!
Can you explain to me what's going on?
"Dear", have you watched it before?
Who is your dear?
I'm referring to the movie.
Zhao Wei and Huang Bo were the main leads.
Why are you talking movies now?
The one up front is a child trafficker.
He kidnapped a child.
How do you know that he's one?
GeGe, where are you taking me to?
These people are way too bold.
To think they dared to kidnap a child in broad daylight.
Nonsense. Doesn't child kidnapping always happen during the day?
They are all asleep at night.
You are the know-it-all. Drive faster!
Don't even think of escaping from me!
Hold on tight.
Guan Xiaodi, come out! It's on fire!
I can't. The front and back doors are locked. We can't get out.
Wake up!
Protect the child! -Wait!
Pass me the child!
Give her to me! -Carry her away from here.
You come out quickly too.
Liang Dawei! My foot is stuck!
Liang Dawei!
Guan Xiaodi!
Liang Dawei!
Mother.
Ok now.
Go! Quick!
Why are you still standing here? Quick!
Are the two of you alright?
- Fine.- Fine.
Let's go to the police.
I have made a police report.
Where is the child? How is she?
Is she alright?
Come, let's take a look at her.
Thank you, Uncle.
You are welcome.
